named-query.name: BC_READ_SANDBOX_ITEM_BY_TEMP_ITEM_ID
named-query.query: SELECT sandboxItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE sandboxItem.temporaryItemId = :temporaryItemId AND sandboxItem.sandBoxId = :sandboxId AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = 'N' AND sandboxItem.sandBoxItemType = :itemType

named-query.name: BC_READ_SANDBOX_ITEM_BY_TEMP_ITEM_ID_AND_PROD_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT sandboxItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE sandboxItem.temporaryItemId = :temporaryItemId AND sandboxItem.sandBoxId IS NULL AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = 'N' AND sandboxItem.sandBoxItemType = :itemType

named-query.name: BC_READ_ALL_SANDBOX_ITEMS
named-query.query: SELECT sandboxItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE sandboxItem.sandBoxId = :sandboxId AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = 'N'

named-query.name: BC_READ_ALL_SANDBOX_ITEMS_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT sandboxItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE sandboxItem.sandBoxId = :sandboxId AND sandboxItem.sandBoxItemType = :sandBoxItemType AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = 'N' ORDER BY sandboxItem.id

named-query.name: BC_READ_ALL_SANDBOX_ITEMS_BY_TYPES
named-query.query: SELECT sandboxItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE sandboxItem.sandBoxId = :sandboxId AND sandboxItem.sandBoxItemType IN (:sandBoxItemTypes) AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = 'N' ORDER BY sandboxItem.id

named-query.name: BC_READ_SANDBOX_ITEM_BY_GROUP_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT sandboxItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE sandboxItem.sandBoxId = :sandboxId AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = 'N' AND sandboxItem.groupDescription = :groupName ORDER BY sandboxItem.id
